001package fr.univavignon.pokedex.api;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004
005public class PokemonMetadataProvider implements IPokemonMetadataProvider {
006
007    ArrayList<PokemonMetadata> metadataList;
008
009    public PokemonMetadataProvider() {
010        this.metadataList = new ArrayList<PokemonMetadata>();
011        metadataList.add(new PokemonMetadata(0, "Bulbizarre", 126, 126, 90));
012        metadataList.add(new PokemonMetadata(133, "Aquali", 186, 168, 260));
013    }
014
015    @Override
016    public PokemonMetadata getPokemonMetadata(int index) throws PokedexException {
017        if (index < 0 || index > 150) {
018            throw new PokedexException("Erreur : Index non compris entre 0 et 150");
019        }
020        for (PokemonMetadata pokemon : metadataList) {
021            if (pokemon.getIndex() == index) {
022                return pokemon;
023            }
024        }
025        return null;
026    }
027}
